title: Introducing: Anteros
body:
The newest addition to the Duly Noted Records roster, **Anteros** join the likes of Black Honey, Osca, The Night VI and Paperwhite, on one of the UK’s most exciting labels for emerging artists.

Their self-titled debut outing, is a bold first step, hinting at epic, festival ready pop, not too far from the likes of Kodaline, or dare I say it, even Coldplay. Check it out below.
